item.title: Sparkfun's Autonomous Vehicle Competition
item.description:
The Sparkfun Autonomous Vehicle Competition (AVC) was a smash! You can watch some footage of the event at Sparkfun's Ustream page. Here is what the starting / finishing line looked like:
And some judges on the roof watching to make sure the Flying robots do not cut corners. [](/uploads/startingline.jpg) I was very impressed by the UAVs (unmanned aerial vehicles). Most of them were able to complete the course in record time.
